snippet.title: Cataclismo 1.0 Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
The Early Access is over!

Build your castle brick-by-brick as you defend humanity against swarms of horrors with Calaclismo, available NOW on Steam, Epic Store and GOG. 

In Cataclismo, players must design fortresses, optimize production in the citadel, train and deploy a wide range of troops, and make impactful tactical choices as they fight to defend the last bastion of Humanity.

➤ STEAM: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1422440/Cataclismo/

Follow us on social media:
➤ Discord:   / discord   
➤ Twitter: https://x.com/DigitalSunGames 
➤ Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/digitalsungames
